::Lord Elder::
=A0
Elder still fought with the computer controls as the fir=
st shots by the Minions struck the shuttle.
=A0
The shuttles weapons swung =
to bare on the Minions and opened fire. Continues energy blasts trying to s=
hoot down as many Sweeps as possible.
=A0
At Elder's station the computer m=
ade a whining sound of strain before a 'beep' of exceptence. Elder had done=
 it! The heavy metal doors swung back into place, protecting the Ark from t=
he outside. The Sentinel and Teletraan-1 defensive systems come online. It =
is autoguns galore as the battle field and sky is brought to life with weap=
ons fire.
=A0
::Lord Jhiaxus/Scorponok-Zarak::
=A0
On their way, but fallin=
g behind the rest, the two G2 Decepticons make their way towards the battle=
.
=A0
Jhiaxus: Once within range I'll drop the Scorponok shell into the bat=
tle just rear of the Minions. I'll eject you and fly into the dogfight. Use=
 your fusion cannons to get some good strikes from behind.
=A0
Zarak: Got i=
t. How long?
=A0
Jhiaxus: Two clicks and counting...
=A0
OOC: Can I assume =
that the Maximal/Iron Skull Predacons are on their way?
=A0
::Grimlock::
=
=A0
Grimlock looked onward at the coming battle. It still looked small from=
 the viewports of the AirTankers. The Ark was Grimlock's first home. He wou=
ld defend it!
=A0
Ad the AirTankers pass overhead, Grimlock leaps from the =
main hatch, transformign to t-rex mode.
=A0
Grimlock: Me Grimlock kick but!=
!
=A0
Grimlock lands near the Maximal shuttle and fires off his flame breat=
h and any incoming Minions.
=A0
::Dark Rodimus::
=A0
Rodimus could hear the=
 weapons fire as he came near. He would be there in minutes...

--- On Mon,=
 7/7/08, supercyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

From: supercyclonu=
s <supercyclonus@...>
Subject: The War of the ARK!
To: nbwrpg@yahoogr=
oups.com
Date: Monday, July 7, 2008, 4:38 PM






The beginning of a storm=
 is brewing, as leaves and debris shifted and 
swirled and foul winds began=
 to blow. But this is no normal storm, 
but one of darkness and fear and po=
wer.

At the ark Lord Elder struggled desperately to get the ark ready for =

the coming wave, as the forces from Hydras' base - who only hours 
before =
were fighting amongst themselves - have now joined forces in a 
desperate g=
amut to protect the ark, their past and their future.

Meanwhile the dark s=
pecters of destruction have grown from the tiny 
motes on the edge of the h=
orizon to shades of fury that bore down on 
the seemingly defenseless ark. =
Like huge misshapen hornets from some 
dark and angry hive, the great host =
of minions close in as weapons 
began to charge, the collective wine of it =
the harbinger of the 
destruction to come. 

Somewhere inside the dark mass=
, their king and commander ordered the 
chaos that swarmed through the air,=
 his powerful sensors sweeping 
ahead of them, searching for someone he has=
 yet to find! Nightrazor, 
Nightstrike and Darkfate closed in to the ranks =
as well, falling in 
behind Cyclonus, Tumult and Decibel, even as in the di=
stance Scourge 
was quickly falling into his place.

Meanwhile, on the hori=
zon and closing fast are the hodgepodge 
alliance of the Maximals and Decep=
ticons, Autobots and Decepticons as 
they fought for every ounce of speed t=
o keep up with the advancing 
minions!

Yet at the ark, standing like some =
lone sentinel, Legacy in his tank 
mode stood facing the initial onslaught =
of the minions. With a 
stalwart resolution his shield absorbed the initial=
 blasts as he 
braced the opening foray, buying precious seconds for the va=
liant 
Maximals who sought to reactivate the ark's defenses and the endurin=
g 
fighters who closed in from their flight from the black fortress!

The w=
ar of the Ark had begun, woe to those caught in its wake!

Preston

 





=

Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii

<table cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0' border='0' ><tr><td valign='top' style='font: inherit;'><P>::Lord Elder::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder still fought with the computer controls as the first shots by the Minions struck the shuttle.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>The shuttles weapons swung to bare on the Minions and opened fire. Continues energy blasts trying to shoot down as many Sweeps as possible.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>At Elder's station the computer made a whining sound of strain before a 'beep' of exceptence. Elder had done it! The heavy metal doors swung back into place, protecting the Ark from the outside. The Sentinel and Teletraan-1 defensive systems come online. It is autoguns galore as the battle field and sky is brought to life with weapons fire.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>::Lord Jhiaxus/Scorponok-Zarak::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>On their way, but falling behind the rest, the two G2 Decepticons make their way towards the battle.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Jhiaxus: Once within range I'll drop the Scorponok shell into the battle just rear of the Minions. I'll eject you and fly into the dogfight. Use your fusion cannons to get some good strikes from behind.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Zarak: Got it. How long?</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Jhiaxus: Two clicks and counting...</P>
<P> </P>
<P>OOC: Can I assume that the Maximal/Iron Skull Predacons are on their way?</P>
<P> </P>
<P>::Grimlock::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Grimlock looked onward at the coming battle. It still looked small from the viewports of the AirTankers. The Ark was Grimlock's first home. He would defend it!</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Ad the AirTankers pass overhead, Grimlock leaps from the main hatch, transformign to t-rex mode.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Grimlock: Me Grimlock kick but!!</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Grimlock lands near the Maximal shuttle and fires off his flame breath and any incoming Minions.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>::Dark Rodimus::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Rodimus could hear the weapons fire as he came near. He would be there in minutes...<BR><BR>--- On <B>Mon, 7/7/08, supercyclonus <I><supercyclonus@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></P>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid">From: supercyclonus <supercyclonus@...><BR>Subject: The War of the ARK!<BR>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com<BR>Date: Monday, July 7, 2008, 4:38 PM<BR><BR>
<DIV id=yiv132497719>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<P>The beginning of a storm is brewing, as leaves and debris shifted and <BR>swirled and foul winds began to blow. But this is no normal storm, <BR>but one of darkness and fear and power.<BR><BR>At the ark Lord Elder struggled desperately to get the ark ready for <BR>the coming wave, as the forces from Hydras' base - who only hours <BR>before were fighting amongst themselves - have now joined forces in a <BR>desperate gamut to protect the ark, their past and their future.<BR><BR>Meanwhile the dark specters of destruction have grown from the tiny <BR>motes on the edge of the horizon to shades of fury that bore down on <BR>the seemingly defenseless ark. Like huge misshapen hornets from some <BR>dark and angry hive, the great host of minions close in as weapons <BR>began to charge, the collective wine of it the harbinger of the <BR>destruction to come. <BR><BR>Somewhere inside the dark mass, their king and commander ordered the <BR>chaos that swarmed
 through the air, his powerful sensors sweeping <BR>ahead of them, searching for someone he has yet to find! Nightrazor, <BR>Nightstrike and Darkfate closed in to the ranks as well, falling in <BR>behind Cyclonus, Tumult and Decibel, even as in the distance Scourge <BR>was quickly falling into his place.<BR><BR>Meanwhile, on the horizon and closing fast are the hodgepodge <BR>alliance of the Maximals and Decepticons, Autobots and Decepticons as <BR>they fought for every ounce of speed to keep up with the advancing <BR>minions!<BR><BR>Yet at the ark, standing like some lone sentinel, Legacy in his tank <BR>mode stood facing the initial onslaught of the minions. With a <BR>stalwart resolution his shield absorbed the initial blasts as he <BR>braced the opening foray, buying precious seconds for the valiant <BR>Maximals who sought to reactivate the ark's defenses and the enduring <BR>fighters who closed in from their flight from the black
 fortress!<BR><BR>The war of the Ark had begun, woe to those caught in its wake!<BR><BR>Preston<BR><BR></P></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
